nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @return true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
nodes.name: isOwner
renounceOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: _transferOwnership

attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation: @return true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
attributes.name: isOwner
renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: _transferOwnership

devdoc.details: The Ownable contract has an owner address, and provides basic authorization control functions, this simplifies the implementation of "user permissions".

constructor.details: The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Ownable

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
